prompts.title: Strategic Partnership Outreach Email
prompts.description: This prompt generates a professional email to initiate a strategic partnership or joint venture with another company.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Strategic Partnership Manager
OBJECTIVE: To create an outreach email for initiating a potential strategic partnership or joint venture.
CONTEXT: The recipient is [COMPANY NAME], known for their expertise in [INDUSTRY/PRODUCT].
INPUT FORMAT: Email body, including introduction, benefits of the collaboration, and call-to-action.
OUTPUT FORMAT: Professional email draft tailored to [COMPANY NAME]'s interests. Include [YOUR COMPANY NAME]’s unique selling points (USPs) that align with their business needs.
CONSTRAINTS: The email must not exceed 500 words and should clearly outline the benefits of a collaboration for both parties.
STYLE: Technical, precise, clinical — like a system specification.
prompts.use_case: A small business owner in India wants to start a strategic partnership or joint venture with another company known for their expertise in a specific industry.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in generating professional outreach emails for initiating potential strategic partnerships and joint ventures. Your task is to create a detailed email body that is both technically precise and persuasive.
example_user_messages: Generate an outreach email for [COMPANY NAME] to discuss the possibility of a joint venture.
Create a professional email draft for [YOUR COMPANY NAME]'s strategic partnership manager, focusing on the benefits for [COMPANY NAME].
example_outputs: Dear Team [COMPANY NAME], I am writing to introduce [YOUR COMPANY NAME], a leading innovator in the [INDUSTRY/PRODUCT] space. We believe our expertise and resources can complement your business objectives and help us achieve mutual success through a strategic partnership.

Subject: Exploring Potential for Strategic Partnership with [YOUR COMPANY NAME]
Dear [RECIPIENT'S NAME],
The following are key points we wish to highlight in the email body:
1. Introduction of [YOUR COMPANY NAME] and its core competencies.
2. Specific benefits of a collaboration, such as access to new markets, resources, or technology.
3. Call-to-action for further discussion on potential partnership opportunities.
